description: With greatness comes oneness. Free will is the epitome of the self, and the divine manifest. Therefore, divinity dwells within us all; it is omnipresent in this world. Prove your supremacy by surpassing all and becoming the true One.

description: Ravenousness is born of craving. To the famished masses, the bounty of nature is a tantalizing feast. To the lovelorn, even the most rotten fruit's flesh is sickly sweet. Only by tasting that sour, bitter fruit can boys finally ripen into men.
You think I look pretty scary, huh? Well, there ain't nothin' to me really. I'm kinda the lowest of the low. I don't got no strength, no wisdom. I don't think you'd like me when I get angry though.
evo_description: You don't gotta be scared of me. Everyone knows I'm just a little goon. Still, you shouldn't mess with folk who've got weapons. This sword's kinda tiny, but it still hurts.

"Ding-dong, ding-dong!"
"You annoying little—I'm trying to work here!"

"Wait, you guys, how long am I supposed to do this for?"

Initially a performance done in jest—a mimicry of the knights of lore. However, do something ironically for long enough, and it soon becomes sincere.
"A goblin fights, so that goblinkind can live as their goblin selves without fear."

evo_description: The goblin eventually found the watering hole, but by then, had forgotten why he had ventured outside in the first place. He continued wandering, never to be seen again.

description: Have stars that need watching? You're in luck—I offer professional starsitting services! Want someone to look after your home star? No problem: my eyes will be glued to it! If I spot anything unusual, I dispatch an angel to the scene, so you can rest at ease!
evo_description: Hmm? Something seems odd about this one. Can I get an angel dispatched to this star, pronto? Please double-check that the client is all right. Where are they? I don't know, my globe doesn't tell me that!

...A goblin? Remembering to show up for a test? Unheard of!

description: I've painted on canvas, walls, floors, and even ceilings. Too restrictive—it's just not enough space for my boundless imagination! I'm gonna go out there with my brush and turn the whole world into my canvas!
evo_description: The most important thing about world painting is to use materials that won't go harming the spirits of the earth. See these paints? They wash away with just a little bit of rain! That's perfect for me, because my brush strokes are more important than leaving a lasting mural!

description: Beauty begets love; love begets life—thus, the circle continues. She is the goddess of beauty; she is the goddess of life. She is capricious in her manner; she is whimsical in her ways. Neither god nor man is able to resist the allure of a fruit so ripe.
evo_description: Beauty begets war; war begets death—thus, the spiral of mortality continues. She is the goddess of beauty; she is the goddess of death. Though she is a paradox, all are drawn to the orchard over which she presides. "You have lived well... Now, pluck me from the vine."

description: Beauty begets love; love begets life—and beyond lies eternal repose. Fallen warriors find their way to the goddess of love and beauty. On a whim, she invites them to surrender themselves unto paradise. "Come, let us nap together. Relax—earthly ties bind you no longer."
evo_description: Beauty begets war; war begets death—and beyond lies hope for eternal peace. The goddess of love and beauty, however, grants no rest for those who catch her gaze. Innocently, she tramples all in pursuit of pleasure. "I am yours to command, and our rest has only just begun."

description: The "Sage of the Sea" is no more. It is not wisdom that will protect his brethren, but force. The sagacious merman casts aside reason and girds himself for battle alongside his comrades.
evo_description: The hands that once turned pages turn now to rending flesh. The mouth that once imparted knowledge now imparts fanged death. The sage's long-awaited successor did not come; the only option left is to carry out his duty and become the "Scourge of the Sea."

description: A party? Must be some party if you're trekking through these parts, heh. You shouldn't have to worry about safety on your way to a good time, right? Just let me take the lead and we'll get there in one piece, guaranteed.
evo_description: Yo! I'd ask if you had fun, but it's written all over your face. Work hard and play hard, am I right? I imagine you're feeling a bit weary from your travels, so count on me to guide you back home safe and sound.

—Goddess of the West Wind
